Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: Berlin workshop for young researches, Berlin (on invitation)
5th seminar in Stochastic Analysis - Ascona - in June 2005; Bachelier Seminar at Institute Henri Poincaré, Paris, in December (both on invitation)

ORFE Seminar, Princeton, March 2006; First Amamef conference, Antalya, April 2006; Groupe de travail CMAP seminar, Ecole Polytechnique de France, October 2006; Seminar of the TU Math Department, Helsinki U-Technology, October 2006; Seminar on Financial Mathematics, ETH Zurich, November 2006 (all on invitation)

Columbia probability seminar, February 2007; Mathematical Finance seminar, UT at Austin, April 2007; Mathematical Finance seminar, Boston University July 2007; Mathematical Finance Seminar, UT at Austin, October 2007 (all on invitation)

Third Amamef conference, Pitesti -Romania, May 2008 (invited); conference Stochastic Analysis and Application, Princeton June 2008 (invited); NSF/CMBS Conference on Convex Duality Methods in Math. Finance, UCSBarbara, June 2008 (invited)
Financial Mathematics Seminar (two lectures) - University of Michigan April 2009; conference on Stochastic Analysis and Applications, Hammamet, October 2009. Both on invitation

Mathematical Finance Seminar, Dublin City University, February 2011; Workshop in Financial Mathematics, Milano Statale Univ., April 2011; ICIAM, Section in Advances in Financial Mathematics, Vancouver, July 2011. All on invitation
Co-organizer of the national AMASES congress 2011, at uniPisa.
Nomura Seminar, Oxford, March 2012; Math. Finance Workshop, LUISS, Roma, March 2012; Bachelier Seminar at Institute Herni Poincaré, Paris, May 2012. All on invitation
Mathematical Finance Seminar, Milano bicocca, February 2013; London Mathematical Finance Seminar, March 2013. Both on invitation
Conference: 'Mathematical Finance: Arbitrage and portfolio optimization', Banff research station, Canada, May 2014. On invitation.
Conference: Mathematics and Financial Economics, ZIF Bielefeld, May 2015; Nomura Seminar, Oxford, May 2015. Both on invitation
15th Winter School in Mathamatical Finance, Lunteren, Holland, January 2016.

Statistics and Mathematics Seminar, WU Wien, January 2017; Workshop on stoch. analysis and optimization, King's College London, June 2017; Inaugural Conference: Mathematical Economics and Finance, University of Manchester, July 2017. All on invitation

Conseguimento di premi e riconoscimenti.content: Indam-Simai prize for the best Italian PhD thesis in Applied Mathematics, years 2004-2006.

MINERVA FOUNDATION LECTURES - special PhD course on the research topics of the appointed professor. Title: 'Topics in portfolio optimization with general underlying assets', 5-lectures (2h each) course for the Columbia IEOR PhD students.

Partecipazione al collegio dei docenti o.content: Ateneo proponente: Università degli Studi di PERUGIA Titolo del dottorato: "METODI MATEMATICI E STATISTICI PER LE SCIENZE ECONOMICHE E SOCIALI" Insegnamento di un corso di metodi quantitativi per la finanza, assieme a S. Herzel
Ateneo proponente: Università di PISA Titolo: "SCUOLA DI DOTTORATO IN SCIENZE AZIENDALI, ECONOMICHE E MATEMATICO-STATISTICHE APPLICATE ALL'ECONOMIA "FIBONACCI""
Ateneo proponente: Libera Univ. Inter.le Studi Sociali "Guido Carli" LUISS-ROMA Titolo del dottorato: "ECONOMICS" Anno accademico di inizio: 2017/18 - Ciclo: - Durata: 4 anni

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: PRIN 2004-2004, coordinatore nazionale Wolfgang Runggaldier. Partecipazione con l'unità di Firenze, Titolo Dualità in Finanza Matematica.

Partecipazione al progetto Prin Finanza Stocastica: applicazioni della Teoria Generale dei Processi Stocastici. Coordinatore scientifico RUNGGALDIER Wolfgang Johann Responsabile scientifico PRATELLI Maurizio Ateneo/Ente Università di PISA

Ruolo Partecipante al Programma di ricerca Dati sul progetto: Coordinatore scientifico FRITTELLI Marco Responsabile scientifico PRATELLI Maurizio Ateneo/Ente Università di PISA Protocollo 2008YYYBE4_005 Area 01 Durata 24 mesi Titolo Teoria generale dei Processi Stocastici e Finanza Matematica.

Ruolo Partecipante al Programma di ricerca Dati sul progetto: Coordinatore scientifico LUNARDI Alessandra Responsabile scientifico GOZZI Fausto Ateneo/Ente Libera Univ. Inter.le Studi Sociali "Guido Carli" LUISS-ROMA Protocollo 2015233N54_006 Settore ERC PE1 Durata 36 mesi Titolo del progetto Deterministic and stochastic evolution equations

Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: Visiting Professor at Operations Research and Fin. Engineering Department, Princeton University. Lecturer of master course FIN 521: fixed income models. With offer of a tenure track position.
Visiting Research Fellow, Boston University, Department of Mathematics. Host prof P. Guasoni.
University of Texas at Austin. Visiting Research Fellow, Mathematics Dept, 3 weeks. Host prof T. Zariphopoulou.
Visiting fellow of the University of Michigan, Ann Arbor. Mathematics Dept, one week April 2009. Host prof E. Bayraktar
Collegio Carlo Alberto - Visiting Research Fellow of the Collegio, two months. Host prof. M. Marinacci
Visiting Researcher, Dublin City University Mathematics Dept, one week. Host prof P. Guasoni
Visiting Researh Fellow of The London School of Economics, Statistics Department, from 01/2015 to 03/2015 Host prof. K. Kardaras.
Oslo Academy of Science, Visiting Researcher under Stochastics in Environmental and Financial Economics (SEFE) project. A month and a half. Contacts: prof G. Di Nunno and prof F. Benth.

Responsabilita' scientifica per progetti.content: European Network on Advanced Mathematical Methods in Finance: short visit Grant no. 901, 2006. PI. Topic: model free fundamental theorem of asset pricing.
